name: Advantage Aviation Inc.
about: Advantage Aviation Inc. is Palo Alto's premier flight club, offering expert flight instruction, aircraft rental, maintenance, and management. With a fleet of over 50 modern aircraft, including Garmin G1000 glass cockpit planes, we provide top-quality training from the best instructors in the Bay Area. Our facilities include a fully staffed modern lounge, instruction rooms, and state-of-the-art maintenance services. We offer training for beginner pilots, instrument and commercial licenses, multi-engine ratings, and tailwheel endorsements. Our introductory flight packages are instructional and hands-on, counting towards FAA pilot certificate requirements. We pride ourselves on providing a world-class flying club experience with exclusive member benefits, seminars, and events. Join us for a comprehensive and enjoyable flight training experience.
